SEARCH
Package org.trustdeck.ace.security.audittrail.annotation

Annotationsschnittstelle Audit

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(METHOD) public @interface Audit
Annotation that enables an audit trail for the annotated method.

  • Optionale Elemente - Übersicht

    Optionale Elemente
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Optionales Element
    Beschreibung
    AuditUserType
    auditFor
    The type of users for which the audit information should be recorded.
    AuditEventType
    eventType
    The type of the audit event (e.g.
    String
    message
    The message to log in the audit trail.

  • Elementdetails

    • eventType

      AuditEventType eventType
      The type of the audit event (e.g. CREATE or DELETE).
      Gibt zurück:
      the audit event type
      Standard:
      UNKNOWN

    • auditFor

      AuditUserType auditFor
      The type of users for which the audit information should be recorded.
      Gibt zurück:
      the audit user type
      Standard:
      ALL

    • message

      String message
      The message to log in the audit trail.
      Gibt zurück:
      the message
      Standard:
      ""
